mn87:3.8: evametaṃ, gahapati → evameva gahapati (bj sakideva); evametaṃ gahapati (pts-vp-pli1ed sakideva)
mn87:3.10: Kassa kho → kissa nu kho (bj); tassa kho (sya-all)
mn87:8.3: rathikāya rathikaṃ → rathiyāya rathiyaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn87:22.5: tvaṃ → tayā (bj); taṃ (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | maṃ → mama (sya-all, km)
mn87:29.2: ativijjha maññe → ativijjha paññāya (pts-vp-pli1ed); paṭivijjha paññāya (mr)
